description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from "EZ2ON REBOOT:R"!

This pack includes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
・Legend of Moonlight / Memme
・The Prince of Darkness / M2U
・ApolloN / sun3
・A Site De La Rue / KIEN (STREME REVERIE)
・sweet★star / ginkiha
・WE ALIVE / Cosmograph
・picking / LUZE
・Daydream / RiraN
・Hi-TECH Soda Machine / M0DRA1D
・???(Secret)

■Navigator
・JIYU
・Shiro

■Avatar
・JIYU(2D)
・Shiro(2D)
・Lucid(2D)
・Luna(2D)
・Sarang & Cube(2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.
name: EZ2ON REBOOT:R Pack
